Play.PlayDescription: (:11) 12-T.Brady kneels to NE 21 for -1 yards. NE-12 Bradyâs 16th career postseason win, tied with Joe Montana for most as a starting QB in NFL history. Bill Belichick 17th career postseason win, ties Joe Gibbs for 3rd-most by head coach in NFL history.
